Master Series Banjos

The Lemon Master Series represents the highest expression of Lemon banjo design — instruments built without compromise, where tone, aesthetics, and individuality are given equal priority.

Each Master Series banjo is designed to deliver powerful, responsive tone with exceptional clarity, depth, and projection. From carefully selected tonewoods to precision-fitted components, every detail exists to serve both sound and player.

View Original Models View Tribute Models

Original Models

Original Models represent fully original Lemon Banjos designs, created from the ground up to explore new tonal possibilities and visual identities.
These instruments are defined by innovation — blending traditional construction principles with modern design, resulting in banjos that feel familiar yet entirely unique.
Every Original Model reflects Lemon Banjos’ vision of what a banjo can become, not just what it has been.

First-Gen Tribute Models

First-Generation Tribute Models honor the instruments and players that shaped the sound of bluegrass itself.
These banjos are carefully designed to capture the tonal character, feel, and visual spirit of the most important early banjos, while benefiting from modern precision and reliability.
Tribute Models are built not as replicas, but as respectful continuations of a legacy that still defines the sound of bluegrass today.
